quotes.quote: Beer is the answer...but I can't remember the question.
I have mixed drinks about feelings, but beer just makes me feel good.
In dog beers, I've only had one.
Beer: Because sometimes one drink just isn't enough.
I'd rather have a beer and memories than a six-pack and amnesia.
Beer: Making people interesting since forever.
Save water, drink beer.
Beer is the glue that holds my life together.
Beer: The reason I wake up every afternoon.
Beer: Because adulting is hard.
Beer: The cause of, and solution to, all of life's problems.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: Beer is like a hug in a glass.
Life is too short to drink bad beer.
I work out so I can drink more beer.
Beer: The liquid version of the weekend.
Beer: It's not just for breakfast anymore.
Beer: Because you can't drink bacon.
Good people drink good beer.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: You look like I need a beer.
Beer: Because sometimes wine just doesn't cut it.
Beer: The official beverage of 'hold my beer and watch this.'
Beer: Liquid sanity.
Beer: Because sometimes coffee just isn't strong enough.
I have a beer for every mood, and every mood is beer.
